name: displayvideo_customBiddingAlgorithms_scripts_create
description: Creates a new custom bidding script. Returns the newly created script if successful.

customBiddingAlgorithmId.description: Required. The ID of the custom bidding algorithm that owns the script.

advertiserId.description: The ID of the advertiser that owns the parent custom bidding algorithm.

partnerId.description: The ID of the partner that owns the parent custom bidding algorithm. Only this partner will have write access to this custom bidding script.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

active.description: Output only. Whether the script is currently being used for scoring by the parent algorithm.

createTime.description: Output only. The time when the script was created.

customBiddingAlgorithmId.description: Output only. The unique ID of the custom bidding algorithm the script belongs to.

customBiddingScriptId.description: Output only. The unique ID of the custom bidding script.

errors.description: Output only. Error details of a rejected custom bidding script. This field will only be populated when state is REJECTED.

name.description: Output only. The resource name of the custom bidding script.

state.description: Output only. The state of the custom bidding script.

ScriptError.description: An error message for a custom bidding script.

column.description: The column number in the script where the error was thrown.

line.description: The line number in the script where the error was thrown.

CustomBiddingScriptRef.description: The reference to the uploaded custom bidding script file.

resourceName.description: A resource name to be used in media.download to Download the script files. Or media.upload to Upload the script files. Resource names have the format `customBiddingAlgorithms/{custom_bidding_algorithm_id}/scriptRef/{ref_id}`.

$ul: **active**: Output only. Whether the script is currently being used for scoring by the parent algorithm.
**createTime**: Output only. The time when the script was created.
**customBiddingAlgorithmId**: Output only. The unique ID of the custom bidding algorithm the script belongs to.
**customBiddingScriptId**: Output only. The unique ID of the custom bidding script.
**errors**: Output only. Error details of a rejected custom bidding script. This field will only be populated when state is REJECTED.
**name**: Output only. The resource name of the custom bidding script.
**script**: The reference to the uploaded custom bidding script file.

**resourceName**: A resource name to be used in media.download to Download the script files. Or media.upload to Upload the script files. Resource names have the format `customBiddingAlgorithms/{custom_bidding_algorithm_id}/scriptRef/{ref_id}`.
**state**: Output only. The state of the custom bidding script.
